column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The salad had everything split up on the plate: mixed greens tossed in an oil vinegrette
column3: and crawfish/shrimp tossed in remoulade sauce. It was great. The fried green tomatoes probably could've been bigger so we weren't just eating the breading
column4: but otherwise it was good too. We also picked out a couple baked items and some coffee. I love the coffee here. A good amount of acidity that doesn't taste like an espresso.
